fr.upmc.datacenter.hardware.computers

Class Computer.AllocatedCore

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.upmc.datacenter.hardware.computers.Computer.AllocatedCore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    Computer

    public static class Computer.AllocatedCore
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    The class AllocatedCore implements object collecting information about cores allocated to an Application VM.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant      processorURI != null
 invariant      processorNo >= 0 && coreNo >= 0
 invariant      processorInboundPortURI != null
 invariant      forall uri in processorInboundPortURI.values(), uri != null

    Created on : August 26, 2015

    Version:
    $Name$ -- $Revision$ -- $Date$
    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
